documentation.text:
@dev Contract module which allows children to implement an emergency stop
 mechanism that can be triggered by an authorized account.
 This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the
 modifiers `whenNotPaused` and `whenPaused`, which can be applied to
 the functions of your contract. Note that they will not be pausable by
 simply including this module, only once the modifiers are put in place.
@dev Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.
@dev Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.
@dev Initializes the contract in unpaused state.
@dev Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.
state variables
An enumarable list of book ids mapped to their prices
@return the number of books owned by an address
modifiers

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct EnumerablePrices.UintToUintMap storage pointer,uint256) view returns (bool)

 Each index in the return values except URIs contain the information of a single book

 mechanism that can be triggered by an authorized account.
 This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the

devdoc.author: Ifebhor Odion Nonse A marketplace for selling books on the OpenBooks contract
devdoc.details: communicates with the OpenBook contract for ownership proof, keeps a record of books for sale and does not transfer books, buyers download

buy(uint256).details: lets a buyer download the book after successful payment the transaction's value must not be less than the books price

constructor.details: stores the address of the contract holding the books

params._openBooks: the address of the contract holding the books,  it cannot be zero

deList(uint256).details: removes a book's id from the enumerable prices list

params._bookId: the id of the book to be removed from sale, it must be on sale

getAllBooksOnSale().details: iterates through prices to get all the books

returns.URIs: the URIs of all the books on sale
returns.bookIds: the ids of all books on sale
returns.bookPrices: the prices of all books on sale

params._bookId: the id of the book whose information is needed

returns.URIs: a string of URIs with each URI separated by a " "

params._bookIds: the ids of the books which their information is needed

returns.URIs: a string of URIs with each URI separated by a " "
returns.bookPrices: an array of the price of each book in it's corresponding index in _bookIds

returns.price: the price of the book on sale, it's zero if the book is not on sale

returns.bookPrices: an array of the price of each book in its corresponding index in _bookIds

list(uint256,uint256).details: the book's id and its price are added to the enumerable prices

params._bookId: the id of the book to be listed
params._price: the price to be sold for, it cannot be zero

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw().details: can be called by anyone and they are given all of their  balance in balances withdrawals must not be paused

withdrawPaused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

balances.return: the number of books owned by an address

devdoc.title: A BookShop

buy(uint256).notice: Lets a buyer pay for the book with at least the specified price

deList(uint256).notice: Used to remove a book from sale

getAllBooksOnSale().notice: Gets all the books on sale

getBookInfo(uint256).notice: Gets the URI and price of a book

getBookURIs(uint256[]).notice: Gets the URIs of a list of books

getBooks(address).notice: Gets all the bookIds, bookPrices, and URIs of books owned by an address Each index in the return values except URIs contain the information of a single book

getBooksInfo(uint256[]).notice: Gets the URI and the price of a list of books

getOpenBooks().notice: Used to get the address of the contract holding the books

getPrice(uint256).notice: Used to get the price of a book on sale

getPrices(uint256[]).notice: Gets the price of a list of book ids

list(uint256,uint256).notice: Used to put a book up for sale

pauseBuy().notice: Pauses the buy function and is only callable by the contract owner

pauseWithdraw().notice: Pauses the withdraw function and is only callable by the contract owner

unPauseBuy().notice: Unpauses the buy function and is only callable by the contract owner

unPauseWithdraw().notice: Unpauses the withdraw function and is only callable by the contract owner

withdraw().notice: Allows anyone withthdraw their proceeds from book sales
